preference.name: IMM_CAD_PrimaryMaterialRelation
preference.preference_description: Defines the relation to be used to attach the material revision to the part revision when saving from any CAD system back to TC. The default value is "Mat1UsesMaterial". If this preference exists the IMM_NX_PrimaryMaterialRelation could be removed. For NX, the legacy IMM_NX_PrimaryMaterialRelation preference takes precedence if it exists.
